com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class MovementInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.MovementInfo

  • public abstract class MovementInfo
extends Object
    A helper class that is used in the context of GraphSnapContext to describe the movement of entities during the edit process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected MovementInfo(PointD originalLocation, MoveTypes moveType, IModelItem movedItem)
      Initializes a new instance of the MovementInfo class.

      Indicates the type of the movement for this instance.

      Gets the original location of the element at the time the editing started.

      • MovementInfo

        protected MovementInfo(PointD originalLocation,
                       MoveTypes moveType,
                       IModelItem movedItem)
        Initializes a new instance of the MovementInfo class.
        Parameters:
        originalLocation - The original location.
        moveType - The type of the move.
        movedItem - The item that is being moved.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentLocation

        public abstract IPoint getCurrentLocation()
        Gets the current location as a live point.
        Returns:
        The current location.

      • getHorizontalAnchor

        public final MovementInfo getHorizontalAnchor()
        Gets the horizontal movement info to which this info is anchored horizontally.

        This info can be declared to be implicitly anchored to another info. Method movesHorizontallySynchronizedWith(MovementInfo) will try to match against the anchors to determine if two infos are moving synchronized.

        Returns:
        The horizontal anchor or null.
        See Also:
        setHorizontalAnchor(MovementInfo)

      • getMovedItem

        public final IModelItem getMovedItem()
        Gets the item that is being moved.
        Returns:
        The moved item.

      • getMoveType

        public final MoveTypes getMoveType()
        Indicates the type of the movement for this instance.
        Returns:
        The MoveType.
        See Also:
        setMoveType(MoveTypes)

      • getOriginalLocation

        public final PointD getOriginalLocation()
        Gets the original location of the element at the time the editing started.
        Returns:
        The original location.

      • getVerticalAnchor

        public final MovementInfo getVerticalAnchor()
        Gets the vertical movement info to which this info is anchored vertically.

        This info can be declared to be implicitly anchored to another info. Method movesVerticallySynchronizedWith(MovementInfo) will try to match against the anchors to determine if two infos are moving synchronized.

        Returns:
        The vertical anchor or null.
        See Also:
        setVerticalAnchor(MovementInfo)

      • getX

        public final double getX(double dx)
        Gets the new x coordinate of the element if the mouse has been moved by dx during the gesture.

        This takes the MoveType and OriginalLocation into account.

        Parameters:
        dx - The delta x coordinate.
        Returns:
        The new x coordinate.

      • getY

        public final double getY(double dy)
        Gets the new y coordinate of the element if the mouse has been moved by dy during the gesture.

        This takes the MoveType and OriginalLocation into account.

        Parameters:
        dy - The delta y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The new y coordinate.

      • isHorizontallyFixed

        public final boolean isHorizontallyFixed()
        Gets a value indicating whether the x coordinate of the item is fixed during the move operation.
        Returns:
        The IsHorizontallyFixed.

      • isVerticallyFixed

        public final boolean isVerticallyFixed()
        Gets a value indicating whether the y coordinate of the item is fixed during the move operation.
        Returns:
        The IsVerticallyFixed.

      • movesHorizontallySynchronizedWith

        public boolean movesHorizontallySynchronizedWith(MovementInfo info)
        Determines whether this instances moves synchronized with the provided info.
        Parameters:
        info - The info to check.
        Returns:
        Whether this info and the given info move horizontally synchronized.
        See Also:
        getHorizontalAnchor()

      • movesVerticallySynchronizedWith

        public boolean movesVerticallySynchronizedWith(MovementInfo info)
        Determines whether this instances moves synchronized with the provided info.
        Parameters:
        info - The info to check.
        Returns:
        Whether this info and the given info move vertically synchronized.
        See Also:
        getVerticalAnchor()

      • setHorizontalAnchor

        public final void setHorizontalAnchor(MovementInfo value)
        Sets the horizontal movement info to which this info is anchored horizontally.

        This info can be declared to be implicitly anchored to another info. Method movesHorizontallySynchronizedWith(MovementInfo) will try to match against the anchors to determine if two infos are moving synchronized.

        Parameters:
        value - The horizontal anchor or null.
        See Also:
        getHorizontalAnchor()
